content.question: One way in which the experience of the Moroccan healer Estevanico differed from that of Juan Garrido was that unlike Garrido, Estevanico

choices.label: joined a Spanish expedition aimed at conquest
was forced into his role as an explorer
spent many years in service to the Spanish

content.answer: was forced into his role as an explorer

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
